name: The Western Zombies
description:
Details The Western Zombies is 2D+3D  platformer rouguelike  shooter  strategy game.

You are trapped in the Spacetime Continuum with a hord of Zombies, break the Spaceime Continuum by defeating the Zombies and finally escaping the Spacetime Continuum itself.

Controls ActionPrimary KeySecondary KeyMove LeftAMove RightDJumpWSpace BarSlideLeft CtrlShootLeft Mouse ButtonMeleeRight Mouse ButtonPausePEscape Credits Music
